name: The cursed Queen of Exobia
description:
The mighty Queen of Exobia has fallen to a curse, and a giant, multi-eyed monster has been pouring out of the throne chamber. It will grow over the whole kingdom if you don't fight it back and save the Queen.

Created in 72ish hours for Ludum Dare 34.

CONTROLS:

Left/Right arrow = Move

Spacebar = Jump

Shift = Attack

Up/Down = Move spear up/down
